question: Which is the only Indian city to have been recognised as a 2020 Tree City of the World?
explanation:
The Arbor Day Foundation and the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) have recognised Hyderabad as the 2020 Tree City of the World.
This is the only city in India to have earned this honour, along with 51 cities globally. Haritha Haram is the tree plantation drive of the Telangana state, which made the city to grow and maintain urban forests.
